name: @fredruss/claude-code-companion
description: Desktop pet that shows Claude Code's real-time status

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && cd app && npm run lint && cd .. && npm run test:run
scripts.build: npm run build:scripts && cd app && npm run build && rm -rf ../out && cp -r out .. && cp resources/icon.png ../out/
scripts.test: npm run test:scripts && cd app && npm test
scripts.test:run: npm run test:scripts:run && cd app && npm run test:run
